question: Wimbledon: Alcaraz vs. Fritz
description:
Carlos Alcaraz and Taylor Fritz are scheduled to play each other in a semifinal matchup in the Wimbledon men's singles tournament on July 11, 2025.

This market will resolve to “Alcaraz” if Carlos Alcaraz advances against Taylor Fritz in the semifinal of the Wimbledon men's singles tournament.

This market will resolve to “Fritz” if Taylor Fritz advances against Carlos Alcaraz in the semifinal of the Wimbledon men's singles tournament.

If the match ends in a tie, is canceled, or delayed beyond July 13, 2025, this market will resolve to 50-50.

The primary resolution source will be official information from Wimbledon (https://www.wimbledon.com/index.html), however, a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

question: FIFA Club World Cup: Chelsea vs. PSG – To Lift Trophy
description:
The market will resolve to "Chelsea" if Chelsea wins the 2025 FIFA Club World Cup Final.

The market will resolve to "PSG" if Paris Saint-Germain wins the 2025 FIFA Club World Cup Final.

If the 2025 FIFA Club World Cup has not been completed by December 31, 2025, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to "50-50".

The resolution source for this market will be official information from the FIFA Club World Cup.

question: Will Chelsea beat PSG?
description:
In the upcoming FIFA Club World Cup Final game, scheduled for July 13 at 3:00PM ET,
If Chelsea wins, this market will resolve to “Yes”.
If Chelsea loses, this market will resolve to “No”.
If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed.
If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve “No”.
This market refers only to the outcome within the first 90 minutes of regular play plus stoppage time.

question: Ethereum Up or Down on July 12?
description:
This market will resolve to "Up" if the "Close" price for the Binance 1 minute candle for ETH/USDT 11 Jul '25 12:00 in the ET timezone (noon) is lower than the final "Close" price for the 12 Jul '25 12:00 ET candle.

This market will resolve to "Down" if the "Close" price for the Binance 1 minute candle for ETH/USDT 11 Jul '25 12:00 in the ET timezone (noon) is higher than the final "Close" price for the 12 Jul '25 12:00 ET candle.

If the final "Close" price for both of these candles is exactly equal on Binance, this market will resolve 50-50.

The resolution source for this market is Binance, specifically the ETH/USDT "Close" prices currently available at https://www.binance.com/en/trade/ETH_USDT with "1m" and "Candles" selected on the top bar.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance ETH/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

question: MSI Playoffs: Bilibili Gaming vs. Anyone's Legend
description:
Bilibili Gaming and Anyone's Legend are scheduled to play each other in the playoffs of the Mid-Season Invitational on July 10, 2025, at 8:00 PM ET.

This market will resolve to “Bilibili Gaming” if Bilibili Gaming wins against Anyone's Legend in the best of 5, playoff matchup of the Mid-Season Invitational.

This market will resolve to “Legend” if Anyone's Legend wins against Bilibili Gaming in the best of 5, playoff matchup of the Mid-Season Invitational.

If the match ends in a tie, is canceled, or delayed beyond July 16, 2025, this market will resolve to 50-50.

The resolution source for this market will be official information from LoL Esports (https://lolesports.com/en-GB/tournament/113470835034591734/overview).

If the match ends in a tie, is canceled, or delayed beyond July 16, 2025, this market will resolve to 50-50.

The resolution source for this market will be official information from LoL Esports (https://lolesports.com/en-GB/tournament/113470835034591734/overview).

question: Will the price of Ethereum be greater than $2900 on July 11 at 5PM ET?
description:
This market will resolve according to the final "Close" price of the Binance 1 minute candle for ETH/USDT on the time and date specified in the title. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source for this market is Binance, specifically the ETH/USDT "Close" prices currently available at https://www.binance.com/en/trade/ETH_USDT with "1m" and "Candles" selected on the top bar.

If the reported value falls exactly between two brackets, then this market will resolve to the higher range bracket.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance ETH/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

question: Yoon out of custody by July 31?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if President of South Korea Yoon Suk Yeol is released from custody by July 31, 2025, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If Yoon is released but remains under house arrest, the market will still resolve to "Yes".

If Yoon is released on parole, bond, or any other condition that results in them leaving state custody, the market will resolve to "Yes".

Transporting Yoon to another location of custody (e.g., a different prison, court, or hospital within the correctional system) will not suffice to resolve this market to "Yes".

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from government authorities or corrections departments; however, a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

question: Will there be at least 1500 measles cases in the U.S. in 2025?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if there have been 1,500 or more confirmed cases of Measles (Rubeola) in humans in the territory of the United States of America in 2025 according to the CDC case counter by December 31, 2025, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source for this market will be the CDC Measles (Rubeola) counter (see: https://www.cdc.gov/measles/data-research/index.html) at the resolution time. If the counter becomes unavailable, another credible source will be used.

Note: Only cases reported by the CDC Measles (Rubeola) counter will qualify, regardless of reports from U.S. State agencies or other sources.

events.title: Measles cases in U.S. before 2026?

The resolution source for this market will be the CDC Measles (Rubeola) counter (see: https://www.cdc.gov/measles/data-research/index.html) at the resolution time. If the counter becomes unavailable, another credible source will be used.

Note: Only cases reported by the CDC Measles (Rubeola) counter will qualify, regardless of reports from U.S. State agencies or other sources.

question: Hawks vs. Rockets
description:
In the upcoming NBA game, scheduled for July 14 at 4:30PM ET:
If the Atlanta Hawks win, the market will resolve to “Hawks”.
If the Houston Rockets win, the market will resolve to “Rockets”.
If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed.
If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.
